mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENTS ( DID, ANAME, ATYPE, ADATA, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{did}, #{aname}, #{atype}, #{adata, jdbcType=BLOB}, SYSTIMESTAMP, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT AID, DID, ANAME, ATYPE, NULL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM ATTACHMENTS WHERE DID = #{did} ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC
SELECT AID, DID, ANAME, ATYPE, NULL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM ATTACHMENTS WHERE DID = #{did} ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT AID AS aid, DID AS did, ANAME AS aname, ATYPE AS atype, ADATA AS adata, CREATED_AT AS createdAt, UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt FROM ATTACHMENTS WHERE AID = #{aid}
